  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_372</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_372</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Variables estadísticas bidimensionales. Regresión y correlación</string>
            <string language="en">Two-dimensional statistical variables. Regression and correlation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweidimensionale statistische Variablen. 
Rückbildung und Wechselbeziehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Variables statistiques bidimensionnelles. 
Régression et corrélation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Variáveis estatísticas bidimensionais. 
Regressão e correlação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Variabili statistiche bidimensionali. 
Regressione e correlazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δισδιάστατες στατιστικές μεταβλητές. 
Οπισθοδρόμηση και συσχετισμός</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las variables estadísticas bidimensionales. Se estudian los tipos de dependencia entre las variables, la covarianza, las rectas de regresión, el coeficiente de correlación y su interpretación.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study two-dimensional statistical variables. It studies how variables depend on one another, their covariance, regression line, correlation coefficient and their interpretation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">covarianza</string>
            <string language="en">covariance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">descriptiva</string>
            <string language="en">descriptive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regresión</string>
            <string language="en">regression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">bidimensional</string>
            <string language="en">two-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">correlación</string>
            <string language="en">correlation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, zweidimensionale statistische Variablen zu studieren. 
Sie studiert, wie Variablen von einer andere abhängen, ihre 
Kovarianz, Regressionslinie, Korrelationskoeffizient und ihre Deutung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des variables statistiques bidimensionnelles. 
Elle étudie comment les variables dépendent d'une une autre, 
leur covariance, ligne de régression, coefficient de corrélation et 
leur traduction</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
variáveis estatísticas bidimensionais. Estuda como as 
variáveis dependem de uma outra, seu covariance, linha de regressão,
coeficiente de correlação e sua interpretação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare le variabili statistiche bidimensionali. Studia come le
variabili dipendono da una un altro, la loro covarianza, riga di 
regressione, coefficente di correlazione e la loro interpretazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στις δισδιάστατες στατιστικές μεταβλητές μελέτης. Μελετά 
πώς οι μεταβλητές εξαρτώνται από το ένα άλλη, η συνδιακύμανσή 
τους, γραμμή παλινδρόμησης, συντελεστής συσχετισμού και η 
ερμηνεία τους</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kovarianz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
